about_the_game:
"Wrap" is a horror and suspense puzzle game with local Chinese themes. The player will play a debut seven or eight years lack of still not famous "walk-on", "luck to turn", received three important film in the hometown, so back home, by the way to visit sister-in-law...

The setting of the game takes place in Wushan Town in the early 21st century. After a tragic fire, everything seems to have changed. One of the main characters has been given an appointment to shoot a horror movie, but as various strange occurrences start happening, they begin to realize that the filming may not be the only thing that gets completed tonight.

Experience a local dream-like story set at the turn of the century that will bring back a sense of familiarity. Embark on an adventure through hospitals, funeral parlors, and other locations in Wushan Town to uncover the truth. The imaginative artwork creates a surreal atmosphere that will send chills down your spine, all within a safe and comfortable environment.

Experience thrilling adventures with passionate characters and immerse yourself in the full Chinese voice for a truly immersive experience. Discover connections between objects, solve puzzles, escape, and put an end to the nightmare.
